name: Asxn
title: The Hyperliquid Issue 2
text:
Synopsis
Hyperliquid continues to demonstrate strong performance in the decentralized derivatives market, with impressive volume, unique trader engagement, and ecosystem expansion.

Key Insights
- Hyperliquid processed $324B in trading volume over the past 3 months, with an average daily volume of $3.5B
- The platform currently facilitates over 70% of derivative DEX market share
- Daily unique traders consistently average above 20,000, peaking at 60,000 during HYPE token generation event
- The platform generates an annualized revenue of $458.8M
- HYPE staking has attracted over 430.3M tokens (43% of total supply) across 16 validators
- Over 125k HYPE tokens (valued at $3M) have been burned through transaction fees
- Ecosystem projects like Felix, Pyth, HyperLend, and Solv are actively developing and expanding their offerings
- Solv will be the first token with simultaneous CEX and Hyperliquid spot listings
